description: Artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies, frameworks, and applications for creative technology projects. Includes generative AI, computer vision, natural language processing, and specialized AI tools.

children.description: AI systems for analyzing, classifying, and understanding content across different media types including text, images, audio, and video

Technique to separate and isolate specific elements or objects within an image or video.
Open source computer vision and machine learning software library
You Only Look Once - real-time object detection system with multiple versions
